title: Chainlink External Adapter for CCIP Read
description:
The CCIP Read adapter acts as the gateway server for the CCIP Read protocol as outlined here https://github.com/Arachnid/EIPs/blob/ccip-read/EIPS/eip-3668.md. It's job is to take in data from a client, fetch proofs from outside the L1 chain and return it to the client.

The optimism global endpoint reads the latest proof from an Optimism as the L2 chain and returns the proof to the caller. Currently this endpoint has the same functionality as the server in this example https://github.com/smartcontractkit/ccip-read/tree/6d4deb917781f3becda39b9ebad6f21e037af1a6/examples/optimism-metis-gateway.

RPC_URL.description: The RPC URL to connect to the L1 chain

CHAIN_ID.description: The chain id to connect to

L2_RPC_URL.description: The L2 RPC URL to connect to the L2 chain. Required if using the optimism global endpoint.

L2_CHAIN_ID.description: The chain id to connect to

ADDRESS_MANAGER_CONTRACT.description: The address of the AddresssManager contract in the L1 chain. Required if using the optimism global endpoint.
